summary: Build AMOR, a minimalistic luxury jewelry e-commerce website with editorial design, full shopping flow (cart/checkout), wishlist and accounts, content sections (New Designs + Blog), Contact messaging, and a secure admin dashboard for managing products, orders, designs, blog, settings, and SEO.
architectural_notes: Brand site: AMOR luxury jewelry e-commerce with editorial/minimal aesthetic and specified palette (#F8F5F2, #E8E1D9, #C6A75E, #2B2B2B) and typography (serif headings + sans body).
Suggested stack: Next.js/React frontend; Node.js or Django backend; PostgreSQL database; Stripe-ready checkout architecture.
Admin panel required with secure authentication and CRUD for products/blog/new designs plus order management and exports (CSV).
Performance/SEO requirements: mobile-first, fast loading, image compression, SEO-optimized pages and configurable meta settings.
Integrations: Instagram feed for @_amor.gold; email sending via configurable SMTP; contact form stores messages in DB and emails admin(s).
known_issues: Shop page runtime error: <Select.Item /> has an empty string value prop; Select.Item values must be non-empty to allow placeholder clearing.

existing_features.title: Implement a cohesive luxury editorial visual system for AMOR and apply it consistently across all pages (colors, typography, spacing, components, and motion), using the provided palette (Ivory #F8F5F2, Soft Beige #E8E1D9, Matte Gold #C6A75E, Deep Charcoal #2B2B2B), lots of white space, elegant serif headings + clean sans-serif body, smooth fade-in transitions, subtle hover micro-interactions, and subtle product image zoom on hover.
Create the public site navigation and routes for: Home, Shop, Product Detail, New Designs, Blog (list + single post), Contact, Cart/Checkout flow, Wishlist, and Account (order history).

Build the Home page with: (1) hero section containing a full-width luxury jewelry image, brand name “AMOR”, tagline “Crafted Emotion. Eternal Gold.”, and CTA button “Explore Collection”; (2) Featured Collection section showing 4–6 featured products with hover zoom + quick view; (3) About the Brand paragraph and “Discover More” button; (4) New Designs preview showing latest 3 and “View All Designs” button; (5) Instagram section for @_amor.gold; (6) Footer with provided contact details and copyright “AMOR 2026”.

Implement the Shop page with a product grid, filtering by Category (Rings, Necklaces, Bracelets, Earrings), price range, gold type (18K, 14K), stone type, and sorting by Newest, Price Low→High, Price High→Low.
Create Product Detail pages with: image gallery with zoom, title, price, description, material details, stone details, weight, Add to Cart, Add to Wishlist, Share button, and Related products.
Implement a slide-in cart panel with quantity controls, remove item, subtotal, and a Checkout button.

Implement the Checkout flow with forms for shipping information and billing details, a Stripe-ready payment structure (UI and data model placeholders without requiring a live Stripe integration), order placement, an Order Confirmation page, and an email-confirmation-ready structure to the customer.
Build the New Designs editorial page with large artistic imagery, designer story behind each piece, release date, optional “Limited Edition” badge, and optional “Pre-order” button.

Build the Blog listing page with featured article section, grid of posts, categories, search bar, and an SEO-friendly structure; implement single blog post pages with large header image, author, date, social share, and related posts.

Build the Contact page showing the provided contact details and a contact form (Name, Email, optional Phone, Message) with validation, spam protection, storing messages in the backend database, and a user confirmation message; include admin-notification-email-ready structure without requiring external SMTP to function.
Implement secure authentication using Internet Identity and enforce role-based access for Admin Panel routes and admin-only backend methods (admin allowlist stored in backend settings).

Create the Admin Panel with: (1) dashboard overview (total orders, revenue, products count, blog posts count, messages received); (2) product management (add/edit/delete, multiple images upload, price/sale price, stock, SKU, category, featured flag); (3) orders management (view orders, update status Pending/Shipped/Delivered, CSV export); (4) blog management (add/edit/delete, schedule posts, manage categories, feature image); (5) new designs management (add, mark New, mark Limited Edition, set release date); (6) contact messages management (view, mark as read, delete, CSV export); (7) settings (admin emails, contact details, social links, SEO meta settings, logo upload, favicon upload).
Implement user-facing wishlist, user account area, and order history: signed-in users can save products to a wishlist and view past orders associated with their principal and/or email.
Add multi-language-ready structure with English as default (content and UI text organized to allow adding more languages later) without requiring translation content now.

Implement SEO and performance basics: configurable site-wide SEO meta settings (title/description/OG), per-product and per-post meta where applicable, mobile-first responsiveness (iPhone-quality), and image upload/handling with client-side compression to improve load time.
Fix the Shop page runtime error by ensuring every <SelectItem /> in Shop filters uses a non-empty value prop, while still allowing users to clear a filter and see the placeholder state.

Remove the 'Built with … caffeine.ai' / 'designed by caffeine' attribution link and related UI from the site footer so the footer only contains AMOR content (keep copyright text and existing footer navigation/contact sections).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create AMOR Home page with hero, featured products, brand/about section, new designs preview, Instagram integration, and footer contact details
Implement Shop page with product grid, filters (category/price/gold/stone), sorting, and product listing UX
Implement Product detail pages with image gallery + zoom, details, wishlist, share, related products, and add-to-cart
Implement cart and checkout flow: slide-in cart, quantity/remove/subtotal, shipping/billing forms, Stripe-ready payments structure, order confirmation + email confirmation
Build New Designs editorial page with large imagery, designer story, release date, limited edition badge, and optional pre-order
Build Blog listing and single post pages with featured article, grid, categories, search, SEO structure, share, related posts
Build Contact page with validated form, spam protection, store messages in DB, notify admin via email, and user confirmation message
Implement secure Admin Panel: login + dashboard analytics + management for products, orders (status + CSV export), blog, new designs, contact messages (export), and site settings
Add user accounts: registration/login, password reset, order history, and wishlist system
Add luxury UI/UX styling: minimal editorial design, specified palette + typography, smooth page transitions, fade-ins, hover micro-animations, subtle product image zoom, and smooth cursor effect
Add platform-wide requirements: mobile-first responsive, fast loading (image compression), SEO optimization/meta settings, scalable DB-backed architecture, and multi-language-ready (English default)
Remove the “designed by caffeine” logo/credit from the site footer
